Html: I want a solution to speed up the binding of data in to data grid view in WPF application. Now i used i-list to bind data to grid, when we are try to display a huge amount of data like 10,000 object it will take more time. Is there any solution for speed up these porcess? Can u pls specify any methode to list data faster instead of i-list in WPF.

Hi, we'd have to do performance profiling of your application to figure out what the problem might be.  It could be the i-list, or it could be that virtualization is getting turned off, or just that your templates are too complex, etc.  If you could create an issue under the Issue Tracker section and post a copy of your application, we'd be happy to take a look.  Thanks!
